file_content.text: What is this place?
The Immortal Emperor's Vault. Inside, Valkorion stored artifacts even he feared were too powerful and dangerous to use.
I cannot protect you from what lies inside.
Sounds like you don't want me learning your secrets. All the more reason to enter.
You're hiding something.
No! Not like this!
Ungh! No! Ahhh! I will not die here! Not in this place!
She's free. You must... before--
I can't hear you. You're fading!
Was that Valkorion?
Just his usual nonsense. I don't believe a word of it.
Forget about him.
A wise course of action. Valkorion only seeks to further his own cause.
The power surge overloaded the circuits. We're trapped.
I'll take my chances. Everybody in.
Better than staying out here.
He tried to tell me something, but then he disappeared.
He was warning me.
Enjoy it while it lasts. I imagine he'll be back soon enough.
Oh, my daughter... what have you done?
You're not my guardian--just a voice in my head that won't leave me alone.
I can protect myself.
Ever since we arrived, he's been acting strangely.
Something's wrong with him.
The void could be affecting him. Or there could be more to Nathema than he's told us.
This vault has to have some kind of backup system to restore power.
There must be another way out.
There is, in the deepest levels. But Valkorion sealed deadly guardians in here to protect his treasures. After centuries of hibernation, I suspect they will be hungry.
Nothing's ever easy, is it?
I knew trusting you was a mistake. Now we're stuck inside an impregnable vault.
This is your fault, Jarak.
Would you rather be ripped apart by the energy blasts outside? Besides, there is a way out. The vault has a backup generator... if you can reach it.
Valkorion sealed deadly guardians in here to protect his treasures. After centuries of hibernation, I suspect they will be hungry.
If you hadn't brought us here, those energy beams would have blasted us into ash. We owe you, Jarak.
We're alive, thanks to you.
It's nice to be appreciated. Vaylin wasn't one to express gratitude.
And there is another way out. A backup generator in the deepest levels of the vault... if you can reach it.
There is. You must reactivate the power generator, but do be careful...
And there is another way out. You must reactive the vault's backup generator... if you can reach it.
